title: Kansas City Royals End 29 Year Drought
teaser: The Kansas City Royals beat the Chicago White Sox yesterday, reversing a rough season and ending a 29 year long post-season losing streak.
contentencoded:
The Kansas City Royals beat the Chicago White Sox yesterday, reversing a rough season and ending the longest active post-season losing streak of any major sports team in North America.

The Royals will now play the Oakland A’s in a one game wild card playoff.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Greg Echlin of KCUR reports on the Royal’s reversal.

  • KCUR: 29 Years Later, The Royals Make The Playoffs 

Reporter

  • Greg Echlin, sports reporter for KCUR.
